rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a reception area, built according to Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with a colonial-style decor and natural light from windows placed in the east as per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Integrated dining space adjacent to the living room with colonial finishes.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Large master bedroom in the north-east corner with ample natural light and ventilation. Adheres to Vastu principles for wealth and prosperity.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed with colonial aesthetics and adequate space.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace with colonial detailing, positioned in the northeast to boost productivity according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Loft
rooms.description: Enhanced master bedroom space on the first floor with colonial roof structure and Vastu compliant window placement.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for guests or family members, designed with colonial style finishes.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: Open balcony adjoining the living area providing a transitional space between indoor and outdoor environments.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional guest bathroom integrated with colonial design elements.

openings.location: Adjacent to the master bedroom loft

rooms.name: Servant Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom for servants located at the back of the plot ensuring privacy and functional design.

rooms.name: Common Area/Servants' Restroom
rooms.description: Shared living space and restroom area for servants designed with basic colonial amenities.
